summary.span: 为 对象提供主题设置。

span.span: Provides theme settings to objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 类控制工作流设计图面上的 对象的外观。The class controls the look and feel of a object on a workflow design surface. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过从 类派生并为新主题设置适当的属性来创建自定义 。The following example shows how to create a custom by deriving from the class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#30)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#30)] 若要在 上使用主题，请将 应用于 类。To use the theme on a , apply the to the class. param.name: rectangle
param.span: 一个 ，它定义 上的展开按钮的边界。

span.span: The that defines the bounds of the expand button on the .

summary.span: 检索一个画笔，它定义复合活动设计器上的展开按钮的背景显示属性。

span.span: Retrieves a brush that defines the background display properties of the expand button on the composite activity designer.

returns.span: 一个 对象，它使用 参数定义按钮区域，画笔使用从展开按钮的左上角到右下角的线性渐变在该区域中应用两种颜色。

span.span: A object that uses the parameter to define the button area in which the brush applies two colors in a linear gradient from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the expand button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在调用 `null` 之前，展开按钮的背景画笔未设置为 `Nothing`（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则该方法会释放以前的画笔并创建一个新的画笔。If the background brush for the expand button is not set to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) before is called, the method disposes of the previous brush and creates a new one.

summary.span: 执行 构造函数提供的初始化任务之外的其他初始化任务。

span.span: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those provided by the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则 方法会从操作系统获取 对象的设置。If the property is set to `true`, the method obtains settings for the object from the operating system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnAmbientPropertyChanged(valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty ambientProperty) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub OnAmbientPropertyChanged (ambientProperty As AmbientProperty)

param.name: ambientProperty
param.span: 复合设计器主题当前应使用的 枚举值。

span.span: The enumeration value which the composite designer theme should now use.

summary.span: 向 对象通知设计器的环境属性设置已发生更改。

span.span: Notifies the object that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时，它会将 和 属性设置为 。When this method is called it sets the and properties to . 枚举确定设计器主题获取其环境属性设置的位置。The enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings. 如果设置了 值，则设计器主题类会从 属性获取其环境设置。If the value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the property. 如果设置了 值，则设计器主题类会从安装设计器的操作系统中获取其环境设置。If the value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.

summary.span: 获取要在复合活动设计器上使用的水印图像。

span.span: Gets the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.

value.span: 要用作 的水印的 对象。

span.span: The object to use as the watermark for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性的值为 `null`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`），则此属性将提供水印图像。If the property value is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) this property will provide the image for the watermark. 如果 属性设置为有效值，则此属性将设置为 `null` (`Nothing`)。If the property is set to a valid value, this property is set to `null` (`Nothing`).
